them.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
them.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
them.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘him or her’
them.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: If anyone phones, tell them I’ll be back later.
them.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to mean ‘those’. Many people think this use is incorrect
them.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I couldn’t understand all them long words.
